problem.markdown: >>On level ground from a distance of 200 feet, the angle of elevation to the top of a building is 21°, as shown in the figure above. What is the height h of the building, to the nearest foot? << = 77 [explanation] Tangent is opposite over adjacent.
problem.p: On level ground from a distance of 200 feet, the angle of elevation to the top of a building is 21°, as shown in the figure above. What is the height h of the building, to the nearest foot?
